titleStmt.title: An epitomy of history. Wherein is shewn how severall princes and nations, came to their particular countries and dominions; also many great affaires in Judea, Tartaria, Russsia, Poland, Swethland, Germany Italy, Piedmont, Scotland, England, and many other places throughout the world, from the birth of our Saviour to this present time.
titleStmt.author: H. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Simmons in Aldersgate-streete.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to H.C. by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
